column4: i need help, i installed KDE to show a friend how it looked now it has taken KDE as standard but i themed my gnome interface login and everything i want gnome loginscreen and gnome desktop enviroment to be default how do i do that?
try selecting it on the logon screen under "options"
try running "gnome-control-center" from a shell and select the login manager
i don't know how your login screen is modded
